pkgmetadata.longdescription: All-Resolution Inference // It performs All-Resolutions Inference (ARI) on functional Magnetic Resonance Image (fMRI) data. As a main feature, it estimates lower bounds for the proportion of active voxels in a set of clusters as, for example, given by a cluster-wise analysis. The method is described in Rosenblatt, Finos, Weeda, Solari, Goeman (2018) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2018.07.060.
